title: Tin Foil Hat Ep 19:  The Michael Jordan Conspiracy w/ Brandt Tobler
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat. Today Ryan and myself welcome the author of the book Free Roll, Brandt Tobler! On this episode we discuss...
1) The Las Vegas Comedy Scene
2) Running Bets for Bookies
3) Advice from your Uncle Sam
4) The NBA investigation of Jordan
5) The Murder of Jordan's Dad
6) The book "Free Roll" by Brandt Tobler
7) Aaron actually enjoyed this episode
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
